title: Context-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Course Utilizing Real-Life Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen data-driven decision-making skills for social sector roles within organizations.

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-world problems in the workplace (sales analysis, budget planning, etc.) into mathematical models.
Learners can apply linear equations, ratios, and function concepts while solving context-based problems.
Learners can interpret real-life data using digital tools and convert it into visual representations (graphs/charts).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
